title: Did researchers discover new "excessive fuel " more powerful than gasoline in 1,693 times?
subtitle: A viral marketing campaign called top secret fuel - all with the aim of selling investment tips in a costly e-book - was launched on the lithium battery supplier.
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: Scientists have discovered that fuel is thousands of times stronger than gasoline and that only one company is in a position to own the vast majority of its market share.
